job_tasks.phrase: Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development of applications, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
job_tasks.justification: This involves working on backend systems and cloud infrastructure, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
job_tasks.justification: Code review is a standard software development practice to maintain quality and standards.

soft_skills.phrase: Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on general web application and backend development, along with code review and cloud patterns (AWS). There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related specialized tasks, which are central to the GenAI Engineer profile. The emphasis is on traditional software development practices.
